alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 11:30AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gadsden, north central Leon, southeastern Decatur and southwestern Grady Counties through 1215 PM EST... At 1130 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Quincy, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Havana, Quincy, Gretna, Attapulgus, Freemont, Littman, Darsey, Florence, Scotland, Jamieson, Recovery, Laingkat, Calvary, Shady Rest, Princes Still, Amsterdam, Quincy Airport, Branchville and Nickleville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
